docs.snippet: Cincinnati Reds closer Aroldis Chapman broke bones above his left eye and nose when he was hit by a line drive Wednesday night, the latest frightening injury to a pitcher struck in the head by a batted ball....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cincinnati Reds closer Aroldis Chapman broke bones above his left eye and nose when he was hit by a line drive Wednesday night, the latest frightening injury to a pitcher struck in the head by a batted ball.

headline.main: Reds Closer Chapman Hit in Face by Line Drive
headline.print_headline: Reds Closer Chapman Hit in Face by Line Drive

docs.snippet: Texas Rangers outfielder Jim Adduci capped off a 10-pitch at bat by hitting a two-run homer in the eighth inning then led off the 10th with a walk to start the game-winning rally in the Rangers' 7-6 win over the Chicago Cubs Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Texas Rangers outfielder Jim Adduci capped off a 10-pitch at bat by hitting a two-run homer in the eighth inning then led off the 10th with a walk to start the game-winning rally in the Rangers' 7-6 win over the Chicago Cubs Tuesday night.

headline.main: Adduci Homers as Rangers Beat Cubs 7-6
headline.print_headline: Adduci Homers as Rangers Beat Cubs 7-6

docs.snippet: Preserving the best, promoting a “poor man’s” variety and declaring war on imports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Preserving the best, promoting a “poor man’s” variety and declaring war on imports.
docs.abstract: Elaine Sciolino Letter From Paris column; France is seeking to revive and expand its truffle industry by promoting a poor man's variety from Burgundy, preserving the top-rated one and declaring war on Chinese imports.

docs.snippet: Opposition activists in the slums of eastern Caracas hope to unseat President Nicolas Maduro, but not by blocking streets or burning tires. They plan to build parks and fix roads to show that the opposition can do more for poor neighborhoods than ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Opposition activists in the slums of eastern Caracas hope to unseat President Nicolas Maduro, but not by blocking streets or burning tires. They plan to build parks and fix roads to show that the opposition can do more for poor neighborhoods than the ruling socialists.

headline.main: Venezuela Slums Shun Protests for Community Work
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Slums Shun Protests for Community Work
